RoomDescriptions.FamilySuite: Our Family Suite rooms, ideal for family vacations, stand out with their spacious area and functional design.
RoomDescriptions.ParkSuite: Park Suite rooms, one of the highest-level categories in our sanatorium, stand out with their large area and excellent facilities.
RoomDescriptions.DeluxeSuite: Deluxe Suites are distinguished by their elegant design, functional layout, and modern equipment, offering an unforgettable vacation experience.
RoomDescriptions.StandardRoom: We offer 18 Standard rooms designed for the comfort of our guests, equipped with all necessary amenities.
